Question.Subject: What is Necroing on Forums?
Question.Content: So im sharing what i think on a forum and people keep telling me to stop necroing? does anyone know what that means? Its starting to tick me off becuase know they like harrasing me through PM and its getting on my nerves sorry i use KNOW instead of NOW
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Necro = Necromancer
To bring up old topics by posting in them and bringing them to the top. Stick to the topics at the top of the page and you'll be fine.

Answer.Content:
Necro = Necromancer
To bring up old topics by posting in them and bringing them to the top. Stick to the topics at the top of the page and you'll be fine.
